name: Drifter Vest
description: A ragged old cloth and leather vest worn by The Drifter.

languages.description: Eine zerlumpte alte Stoff- und Lederweste, die vom Drifter getragen wurde.
languages.name: Wams: Drifter

languages.description: Une vieille veste usée en tissu et en cuir portée par le Voyageur.
languages.name: Veste du Voyageur

languages.description: Un vecchio gilet di stoffa e pelle indossato dal Drifter.
languages.name: Gilet - Drifter

languages.description: 드리프터가 착용하는, 낡고 해진 천과 가죽으로 된 조끼입니다.
languages.name: 드리프터 베스트

languages.description: Un viejo y harapiento chaleco de cuero y tela usado por el Viajero.
languages.name: Chaleco del Viajero

languages.description: 漂泊者所穿的破旧布皮拼接背心。
languages.name: 漂泊者背心

languages.description: Ветхий тряпичный жилет с кожаными вставками, который носил Скиталец.
languages.name: Жилет: Скиталец

languages.description: 漂流者が着用するボロボロの布とレザーのベスト。
languages.name: 漂流者のベスト

languages.description: Stara i podarta kamizelka noszona przez Włóczęgę.
languages.name: Kamizelka Włóczęgi

languages.description: Um velho colete de couro e pano esfarrapado usado pelo Peregrino.
languages.name: Colete do Peregrino

languages.description: 一件漂泊者所穿的破舊布料和皮革背心。
languages.name: 漂泊者背心

languages.description: เสื้อกั๊กหนังและผ้าเก่าขาด ๆ ที่ดริฟเตอร์สวมใส่
languages.name: เสื้อกั๊กดริฟเตอร์

languages.description: Gezgin tarafından giyilen eski püskü kumaş ve deri yelek.
languages.name: Gezgin Yeleği
